import React, {useState} from 'react' import './sass/style.scss' const Contact = ()=>{ const [val, setValue] =useState({ name: '', email : '', subject: '', message : '' }); const changed = (event) =>{ const {name,value} = event.target; setValue((prevValue) =>{ return { ...prevValue, [name] : value } }) } const formSubmit = () =>{ } return(

) } export default Contact
